languages.text: "То, как его понимаю я. Ни тонкие яства, ни изысканные напитки не заменят того, что насыщает саму душу эльдара. Предсмертные страсти, что испытывает измученная плоть. Ужас. Страдание. Отчаяние. Все то, что мы забираем по праву у других, низших созданий".

"I mean a feast as I understand it. No victuals or libations, however fine, can be a substitute for what sates the Aeldari soul itself — the premortal passions of tortured flesh. Terror. Suffering. Despair. All that which we take by right from other, inferior creatures."
languages.original_text: "То, как его понимаю я. Ни тонкие яства, ни изысканные напитки не заменят того, что насыщает саму душу эльдара. Предсмертные страсти, что испытывает измученная плоть. Ужас. Страдание. Отчаяние. Все то, что мы забираем по праву у других, низших созданий".

traits.locale_text: "I mean a feast as I understand it. No victuals or libations, however fine, can be a substitute for what sates the Aeldari soul itself — the premortal passions of tortured flesh. Terror. Suffering. Despair. All that which we take by right from other, inferior creatures."

"I mean a feast as I understand it. No victuals or libations, however fine, can be a substitute for what sates the Aeldari soul itself — the premortal passions of tortured flesh. Terror. Suffering. Despair. All that which we take by right from other, inferior creatures."

"I mean a feast as I understand it. No victuals or libations, however fine, can be a substitute for what sates the Aeldari soul itself — the premortal passions of tortured flesh. Terror. Suffering. Despair. All that which we take by right from other, inferior creatures."

"I mean a feast as I understand it. No victuals or libations, however fine, can be a substitute for what sates the Aeldari soul itself — the premortal passions of tortured flesh. Terror. Suffering. Despair. All that which we take by right from other, inferior creatures."

languages.text: “我指的是我所理解的盛宴。无论是多么可口的美食或美酒，都无法满足艾达灵族灵魂的渴望。我们渴望受折磨的肉体带来的不灭激情——恐怖、痛苦、绝望，我们有权从其他低等生物身上寻得这样的激情。”
languages.original_text: "I mean a feast as I understand it. No victuals or libations, however fine, can be a substitute for what sates the Aeldari soul itself — the premortal passions of tortured flesh. Terror. Suffering. Despair. All that which we take by right from other, inferior creatures."

traits.locale_text: “我指的是我所理解的盛宴。无论是多么可口的美食或美酒，都无法满足艾达灵族灵魂的渴望。我们渴望受折磨的肉体带来的不灭激情——恐怖、痛苦、绝望，我们有权从其他低等生物身上寻得这样的激情。”

languages.text: 「俺の理解では宴のことだ。祝儀だの酒だの、どれほど素晴らしいものでも、アエルダリの魂そのものに勝るものはない。肉体を痛めつけて得られる、死ぬ間際の情熱が最高なのさ。恐怖。苦痛。絶望。それを俺達は、他の下等生物から当然のように受け取るんだ」
languages.original_text: "I mean a feast as I understand it. No victuals or libations, however fine, can be a substitute for what sates the Aeldari soul itself — the premortal passions of tortured flesh. Terror. Suffering. Despair. All that which we take by right from other, inferior creatures."

traits.locale_text: 「俺の理解では宴のことだ。祝儀だの酒だの、どれほど素晴らしいものでも、アエルダリの魂そのものに勝るものはない。肉体を痛めつけて得られる、死ぬ間際の情熱が最高なのさ。恐怖。苦痛。絶望。それを俺達は、他の下等生物から当然のように受け取るんだ」

languages.text: «Me refiero a un festín tal como yo lo entiendo. Ninguna comida o bebida, por suntuosa que sea, puede sustituir al sustento del alma Aeldari: las pasiones de la carne torturada antes de morir. Terror, sufrimiento y desesperación. Arrebatamos todo eso a otros seres inferiores».
languages.original_text: "I mean a feast as I understand it. No victuals or libations, however fine, can be a substitute for what sates the Aeldari soul itself — the premortal passions of tortured flesh. Terror. Suffering. Despair. All that which we take by right from other, inferior creatures."

traits.locale_text: «Me refiero a un festín tal como yo lo entiendo. Ninguna comida o bebida, por suntuosa que sea, puede sustituir al sustento del alma Aeldari: las pasiones de la carne torturada antes de morir. Terror, sufrimiento y desesperación. Arrebatamos todo eso a otros seres inferiores».

languages.text: « J'ai une conception toute personnelle de l'art et la manière de bien festoyer. Nulles victuailles ou libations, si raffinées soient-elles, ne peuvent se substituer à la nourriture spirituelle propre à sustenter l'âme d'un Aeldari, à savoir les affres ante-mortem des chairs torturées. La terreur. La souffrance. Le désespoir. Tout ce que nous arrachons de plein droit aux créatures qui nous sont inférieures. »
languages.original_text: "I mean a feast as I understand it. No victuals or libations, however fine, can be a substitute for what sates the Aeldari soul itself — the premortal passions of tortured flesh. Terror. Suffering. Despair. All that which we take by right from other, inferior creatures."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai une conception toute personnelle de l'art et la manière de bien festoyer. Nulles victuailles ou libations, si raffinées soient-elles, ne peuvent se substituer à la nourriture spirituelle propre à sustenter l'âme d'un Aeldari, à savoir les affres ante-mortem des chairs torturées. La terreur. La souffrance. Le désespoir. Tout ce que nous arrachons de plein droit aux créatures qui nous sont inférieures. »

languages.text: "Damit meine ich ein Fest nach meiner Fasson. Keine noch so feine Speise und kein noch so feiner Trunk kann ersetzen, was die Seele der Aeldari selbst besänftigt – die Leidenschaften des gefolterten Fleisches vor dem Tod. Schrecken. Leid. Verzweiflung. All das nehmen wir uns rechtmäßig von anderen, minderwertigen Kreaturen."
languages.original_text: "I mean a feast as I understand it. No victuals or libations, however fine, can be a substitute for what sates the Aeldari soul itself — the premortal passions of tortured flesh. Terror. Suffering. Despair. All that which we take by right from other, inferior creatures."

traits.locale_text: "Damit meine ich ein Fest nach meiner Fasson. Keine noch so feine Speise und kein noch so feiner Trunk kann ersetzen, was die Seele der Aeldari selbst besänftigt – die Leidenschaften des gefolterten Fleisches vor dem Tod. Schrecken. Leid. Verzweiflung. All das nehmen wir uns rechtmäßig von anderen, minderwertigen Kreaturen."

languages.text: "Bildiğim anlamda bir ziyafeti kastediyorum. İstediği kadar lezzetli olsun, yiyecek de içki de Aeldari ruhunu yatıştırmada işkence görmüş bedenin ölümden önce tattığı tutkuların yerine geçemez. Dehşet, ızdırap, keder... Sıradan yaratıklardan hakkıyla aldığımız her şey..."
languages.original_text: "I mean a feast as I understand it. No victuals or libations, however fine, can be a substitute for what sates the Aeldari soul itself — the premortal passions of tortured flesh. Terror. Suffering. Despair. All that which we take by right from other, inferior creatures."

traits.locale_text: "Bildiğim anlamda bir ziyafeti kastediyorum. İstediği kadar lezzetli olsun, yiyecek de içki de Aeldari ruhunu yatıştırmada işkence görmüş etin ölümden önce tattığı tutkuların yerine geçemez. Dehşet, ızdırap, keder... Sıradan yaratıklardan hakkıyla aldığımız her şey..."
